entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
